title: Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen (plan)", 1945
medium: Pen and black, green ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, upper right: 448
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Circular soup tureen drawn in plan, lid surmounted by a circular finial indicated in green ink, shoulder decorated with three applied bands flanked by rectangular handles with scalloped-shaped outer edges, each mounted with two circular decorations indicated in green ink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen (plan)", 1945.
1945. Pen and black, green ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-35.
